cn.itcast.tetris.controller
Class Controller

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
      cn.itcast.tetris.controller.Controller
All Implemented Interfaces:
GroundListener, ShapeListener, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.util.EventListener
public class Controller
extends java.awt.event.KeyAdapter
implements ShapeListener, GroundListener

控制器
控制Ground, Snake, Food
负责游戏的逻辑
处理按键事件

Version:
1.0, 01/01/08
Author:
汤阳光
